trans-unit.source: Defines the type of hash algorithm to use with the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 定义要使用的哈希算法类型<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The subject key identifier (SKI) provides a unique identification for a certificate's subject when working with XML digital signing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XML 数字签名时，使用者密钥标识符 (SKI) 的证书的使用者提供的唯一标识。

trans-unit.source: An SKI is an SHA-1 hash of the subject's public key information.
trans-unit.target: SKI 是使用者的公钥信息的 sha-1 哈希。

trans-unit.source: Use the X509SubjectKeyIdentifierHashAlgorithm enumeration to define the type of hash algorithm to use with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> class when creating an SKI.
trans-unit.target: X509SubjectKeyIdentifierHashAlgorithm 枚举用于定义要使用的哈希算法类型<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>类时创建 SKI。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>

trans-unit.source: The subject key identifier (SKI) is composed of a 160-bit SHA-1 hash of the encoded public key (including the tag, length, and number of unused bits).
trans-unit.target: 使用者密钥标识符 (SKI) 组成的编码公钥 （包括标记、 长度和未使用的比特数） 160 位 sha-1 哈希。

trans-unit.source: The SKI is composed of the 160-bit SHA-1 hash of the value of the public key (excluding the tag, length, and number of unused bits).
trans-unit.target: SKI 组成 160 位 sha-1 哈希值的值的公钥 （不包括标记、 长度和未使用的比特数）。

trans-unit.source: The SKI is composed of a four-bit type field with the value 0100, followed by the least significant 60 bits of the SHA-1 hash of the value of the public key (excluding the tag, length, and number of unused bit string bits)
trans-unit.target: SKI 组成具有跟最不重要的 60 位的值的 （不包括标记、 长度和未使用的位字符串比特数） 的公钥的 sha-1 哈希值 0100 的四位类型字段
